What is the purpose of the "memo" field in a transaction, and why is it always a numeric value?

The "memo" field in a transaction is not always a numeric value. In fact, it is a hexadecimal string representation of the memo field. It can contain any type of data, not just numbers. Additionally, if the memo field contains valid UTF-8 text, the API will also return a "memoStr" field with the decoded string.
